data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Braga Municipal.
Throw-in Braga.
Braga's Ricardo Horta fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Braga needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
In Braga, Portimonense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Fabio Verissimo awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great shot from Braga's Paulinho but he is denied by the crossbar.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Braga Municipal.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Paulinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Portimonense.
Fabio Verissimo signals a throw-in for Portimonense, close to Braga's area.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Portimonense are caught offside.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Braga.
Willyan Rocha (Portimonense) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Portimonense at Braga Municipal.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Braga's Trincao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Braga.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Portimonense pushes forward through Henrique Gelain, whose finish on goal is saved.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Bruno Costa is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Paulinho for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Trincao is on target to give Braga a 1-0 advantage.
Paulinho instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Portimonense's Mohanad Ali gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Braga defender.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Important block from the Braga defence as Mohanad Ali fires in a strike for Portimonense.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
At Braga Municipal, Portimonense are penalized for being offside.
In Braga Portimonense attack through Mohanad Ali. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braga.
Portimonense's Pedro Sa breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Braga have a goal kick.
Braga push forward at Braga Municipal and Ricardo Esgaio gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Portimonense defence.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Braga throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Portimonense.
Free kick Braga.
Pedro Sa (Portimonense) gets a yellow card.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over at Braga Municipal.
Goal! Raul Silva extends Braga's lead to 2-0.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Portimonense.
Paulo Sergio (Portimonense) is making a first substitution, with Aylton Boa Morte replacing Lucas Fernandes.
Ricardo Horta puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Trincao.
Trincao (Braga) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portimonense's half?
Throw-in Portimonense.
Free kick Braga.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick Braga.
Braga apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Paulinho. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Throw-in Portimonense.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Braga to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Portimonense push forward at Braga Municipal and Pedro Sa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Braga defence.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Portimonense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Junior Tavares is replacing Henrique Gelain for the away team.
Portimonense have a dangerous throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a free kick to Braga.
The away team replace Mohanad Ali with Ricardo Vaz Te.
Portimonense drives forward and Ricardo Vaz Te gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
In Braga, Fransergio of Braga is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Pedro Amador for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Braga Municipal.
Custodio is making the team's first substitution at Braga Municipal with Wenderson Galeno replacing Trincao.
Braga's Ricardo Horta gets in a shot on goal at Braga Municipal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Paulinho of Braga smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Braga, Jadson of Portimonense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jadson (Portimonense) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga make their second substitution with Andre Horta replacing Joao Palhinha.
Portimonense push upfield but Fabio Verissimo quickly pulls them for offside.
Portimonense's Bruno Costa is on target but unsuccessful.
Fransergio of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabio Verissimo awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portimonense push upfield but Fabio Verissimo quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fabio Verissimo signals a Portimonense throw-in in Braga's half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Throw-in Portimonense.
Rui Fonte is replacing Paulinho for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Braga.
Portimonense's Junior Tavares breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Portimonense.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Willyan Rocha (Portimonense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Fabio Verissimo.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Braga to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
Fabio Verissimo awards the away team a throw-in.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Aylton Boa Morte pulls one back to make it 3-1.
